title: Live Video Production
content: Ive worked in the live music industry for 7+ years, managing small to large teams of creatives

sections.title: Visual Team Lead
sections.content: I have selected and managed teams of creatives to produce live visuals for music festivals and concerts. This includes coordinating budgets and scheduling with ownership as well as building and executing technical requirements based on stage production.

sections.title: Live Video Artistry
sections.content: Leveraging multiple cutting edge technologies to produce live video on the spot, I have performed on stages across the country to crowds of all sizes. Some of the most notable venues ive performed at include: Red Rocks Ampitheater (Colorado), The Mirage (NYC), Spirit of Suwannee Music Park (Florida),  Kings Theater (NYC), Saenger Theater (NOLA), the Orion Ampitheater (Alabama), and many more.
